SEARCH
Package serverCode.Handlers

Class BASE_HANDLER

java.lang.Object
serverCode.Handlers.BASE_HANDLER
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
HanAddMusic, HanCreateMusicIndex, HanPartialSheetMusic, HanRemoveMusic, HanSearchMusic
public abstract class BASE_HANDLER extends Object implements HttpHandler
Abstract base handler for all HTTP request handlers. Provides utility methods for parsing requests, validating HTTP methods and endpoints, sending JSON responses, and authenticating requests.
